speech: Bacterial leaf blight ek bimari hai jo chawal ke patton ko infect karti hai.
Yeh bimari bacterial infection ki wajah se hoti hai aur zyadatar gile mausam mein failti hai.
Symptoms mein patton ka zard ya brown hona aur unka murjh jaana shamil hai.
Yeh bimari waterlogged fields aur contaminated tools ke zariye fail sakti hai.
Iska ilaj karne ke liye copper-based fungicides ka istemal karein aur fields ka pani theek se manage karein.
Resistant varieties ka istemal is bimari ko control karne ka ek acha tareeqa hai.
